name: ROC River
main_text: ROC River is located in River Plaza. This is our newest and most unique branch, designed to offer an exceptional customer experience as a specialty coffee shop and roastery. As a local caf√©, we provide a full range of coffees, along with bakery items and sandwiches, catering to the residents of nearby apartments.
address: Address:   R.O.C. River, 1st Floor Everyday,  River Plaza, Ikh-Mongol avenue, Khan-uul District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia
